Self Hosted Cloud Version Control

Website:https://git.avrami.me

I realised the other day how reliant I was on Github private repositories as a long term store for my university assignments.

After doing some research into open source clients I could deploy I decided it would be pretty easy to deploy Gitea and host my private projects there.

So it begun, Iâ€™ll post more about it soon and include it here.

This project involved learning the following

  • SSH / Linux Bash
  • Containers/Virtualization (Docker)
